entry.title: https://github.com/OpenBankProject/OBP-API
entry.content: An open source RESTful API platform for banks that supports Open Banking, XS2A, PSD2 and Open Finance through access to accounts, transactions, counterparties, payments, entitlements and metadata - plus a host of internal banking and management APIs.
